tasks.title: Frontend: Profile Detail Page
tasks.description: Create a dedicated page at /profiles/:id to view and edit a single profile with all its stored data fields. Include sections for basic info, stored field data, and form fill history. Use React Hook Form + Zod for editing.

tasks.title: Frontend: Profile Selection for Form Fill
tasks.description: Update the form fill workflow to allow users to select which profile to use when auto-filling. Add a profile selector dropdown/modal that shows available profiles with preview of key data fields.

tasks.title: Frontend: Data Field Management UI
tasks.description: Create UI components to manage extracted/stored data fields for each profile. Allow users to view, edit, add, and delete field values. Group fields by category (personal, address, financial, etc.).

tasks.title: Frontend: Form Fill History
tasks.description: Track and display which forms were filled using which profile. Show history on both the profile detail page and a dedicated history view. Include date, form name, and fields used.

tasks.title: Test: Profile Detail Page
tasks.description: Write comprehensive tests for the ProfileDetail page component including unit tests and integration tests.
tasks.details:
Test requirements:
1. Unit tests for ProfileDetail.tsx:
   - Renders loading state correctly
   - Renders error state when profile fetch fails
   - Renders not-found state for invalid profile ID
   - Displays profile basic info (name, type, status, dates)
   - Edit mode toggles correctly
   - Form validation works (name required, min/max length)
   - Save/cancel buttons work in edit mode
   - Archive/restore functionality
   - Delete with confirmation
   - Back navigation works
2. Test profile data fetching with mocked profilesService
3. Test React Hook Form + Zod validation integration
4. Run with: bun run test

tasks.title: Test: Profile Selector Component
tasks.description: Write tests for the ProfileSelector component used in the form fill workflow.
tasks.details:
Test requirements:
1. Unit tests for profile-selector.tsx:
   - Renders loading state while fetching profiles
   - Displays list of user's profiles correctly
   - Shows profile type icons (User for Personal, Building for Business)
   - Handles profile selection callback
   - Auto-selects first profile when none selected
   - Shows empty state when user has no profiles
   - 'Create Profile' button navigates to /profiles
   - Selected profile displays correctly with change option
2. Mock profilesService.getProfiles()
3. Test integration with parent form components

tasks.title: Test: Profile Fields Manager
tasks.description: Write tests for the ProfileFieldsManager component that handles data field CRUD operations.
tasks.details:
Test requirements:
1. Unit tests for profile-fields-manager.tsx:
   - Renders field categories correctly (Personal, Contact, Employment, etc.)
   - Expands/collapses category sections
   - Displays fields with correct values and source badges
   - Inline edit mode activates on edit button click
   - Field value updates correctly
   - Add new field dialog opens
   - New field validation (name required, category required)
   - Delete field with confirmation
   - Save changes calls onSave with updated fields
   - Discard changes reverts to original state
   - Shows empty state when no fields exist
2. Test field categorization logic
3. Test unsaved changes warning

tasks.title: Test: Form Fill History Card
tasks.description: Write tests for the FormFillHistoryCard component that displays form fill history entries.
tasks.details:
Test requirements:
1. Unit tests for form-fill-history-card.tsx:
   - Renders form name and date correctly
   - Displays field count and confidence percentage
   - Shows correct status badge (completed, partial, failed)
   - Renders profile info when showProfile=true
   - Download button triggers onDownload callback
   - View button triggers onView callback
   - Compact mode renders correctly
   - Full mode shows additional details
   - Handles missing optional fields gracefully
2. Test date formatting
3. Test confidence score display

tasks.title: Test: Integration - Profile to Form Fill Flow
tasks.description: Write integration tests for the complete flow from profile selection to form filling.
tasks.details:
Test requirements:
1. Integration test for SimpleFillForm with ProfileSelector:
   - Profile selector appears before form upload
   - Cannot proceed without selecting profile
   - Selected profile data is passed to form fill logic
   - Changing profile updates the form context
2. Test navigation flow:
   - /profiles list -> click profile -> /profiles/:id detail
   - /profiles/:id -> edit -> save -> updates reflected
   - /fill-form -> select profile -> upload form -> fill
3. Mock API calls appropriately
4. Consider Cypress E2E test for critical path
